pkgmetadata.longdescription: # wftutil=================================================================================================================## ☤ The BasicsA Python utility## ☤ InstallationOf course, the recommended installation method is `pipenv `\_::```bashpipenv install wtfutil```or```bashpip install wtfutil```## ☤ Features```pythonfrom wtfutil import util``````pythonfrom wtfutil import sqlutil```## ☤ Thank YouThanks for checking this library out! I hope you find it useful.Of course, there's always room for improvement. Feel free to [https://github.com/vicrack](https://github.com/vicrack)
